page.title: PISSÈ MADE BY THE INCREDIDUMBASSES
page.text: (!hr)(!line) (!hyperlink/https://www.youtube.com/@chesterdumbassbox/#C60A10/Chester) - Animator, Voice Actor, Coder, Compiler (!line) (!hyperlink/https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2aoVwOC0ArTS1oS40QLx2Q/#0070A1/Kubonee) - Composer (!line) (!hyperlink/https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGAnNnhbcqMkfzjHB-GfJCA/#FD7D01/Jacobia) - Designer, Illustrator (!line) (!hyperlink/https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8ihtaX_imOMf8k7uG6rJNw/#18FF00/Minecfplayer) - Designer, Animator (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line) And special thanks to (!hyperlink/https://www.youtube.com/@rin.Incredibox/#64b1e8/Rem) for giving me early access to her newest modding build for this! (I really appreciate it!) (!line)(!line) (Hint: Click on the colored names to go everyone's respective Youtube channel!)

page.title: Special Thanks!
page.text: Incredibox Modding Build created with passion by (!color/#64b1e8/(!bold/Rem))! Love creative mods and unique sounds? Support her work and explore more on her channel! (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line) (!button/#8f1e22/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@rin.Incredibox//Rem's Channel)

page.title: INCREDIBOX BY SO FAR SO GOOD!
page.text: And of corse the official developers of Incredibox, (!bold/Allan), (!bold/Romain) and Incredible (!bold/Polo)! Without them, this project wouldn't exist! (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line)Buy Official Incredibox for more fun and to support the team!(!line)(!line)(!button/#4A4A4A/sfsg-credits-button.png/https://www.incredibox.com//Incredibox Website)(!button/#4A4A4A/sfsg-credits-button.png/https://www.incredibox.com/info/store/Buy Incredibox)
